title: OmegaStarScream
author: OmegaStarScream
content: I'm selling a Reddit account with 12K Karma. It's mostly active in different crypto subreddits.The account has a couple of avatars but I no longer remember the vault's password so they're kinda useless, unless you can find a way to crack the password. They're probably worth about 30-40$ but not so sure, I haven't checked for a while.

comments.author: Limmbabske
comments.body: vault password can be recovered if you know the private key phrase which is given when ou create vault

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: I don't have access to the seed phrase either. I'm not expecting anyone to pay extra for the avatars anyway.BTCump.
